rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Providing free toiletries, this family room includes a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a hairdryer and slippers. The spacious air-conditioned this provides a flat-screen TV with cable channels, soundproof walls, a seating area. The unit offers 1 bed.

rooms.name: Twin Room
rooms.description: Providing free toiletries, this twin room includes a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a bidet with warm/cold water and a hairdryer. This twin room is air-conditioned and features a seating area with a flat-screen TV, soundproof walls, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker. The unit offers 2 beds.
facilities: Entire unit located on ground floor

rooms.name: Deluxe Double Room w/balcony
rooms.description: he spacious double room provides air conditioning, soundproof walls, as well as a private bathroom featuring a walk-in shower and a hairdryer. The double room features parquet floors, a seating area with a flat-screen TV, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker as well as mountain views. The unit offers 1 bed.

rooms.name: Superior Double Room
rooms.description: Providing free toiletries, this superior double room, includes a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, a hairdryer and slippers. The spacious air-conditioned superior double room provides a flat-screen TV with cable channels, soundproof walls, a seating area, a dining area as well as garden views. The unit offers 1 bed.

rooms.name: Superior Suite with Jacuzzi
rooms.description: Superior Suite with Jacuzzi is one of the best experience you have to try. Providing free toiletries, this superior suite room with jacuzzi includes a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and slippers. The spacious air-conditioned superior room provides a flat-screen TV with cable channels, soundproof walls, a wardrobe and a safe deposit box. The unit offers 1 queen bed.

rooms.name: Deluxe Double Room
rooms.description: This double room includes a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, and free toiletries, a hairdryer, and slippers. This double room is air-conditioned and has a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a private entrance, soundproof walls, a minibar, a tea and coffee maker. The unit offers 1 queen bed.
